Name: Teegawende De Loumbila Group
description:
Basse, who is currently single and childless, represents the Teegawende De Loumbila group. For two years, Basse has worked as a gardener. He purchases supplies for his business in the village.

Basse will use this loan to buy four bags of onion bulbs. He plans to use his future profits to grow his business, as he has ambitions of becoming a great entrepreneur in the future.
